title: My Lungs
description: Take a deep breath. What is helping you do that? Your lungs! Readers will love learning all about how the lungs help get oxygen into the body. My Lungs provides students with a clear description of how lungs work, and the clever illustrations provide information as well as entertainment! This captivating book is also great for teaching sequencing and using a glossary to better understand the text.
highFrequencyWords: Leveled Book Lesson PDF
